item.description:
Join us yet again for this now legendary Nerd Fun endeavor, in the heart of intellectual snobbery, Harvard Sq. Be there, or be Sq!

NOTE: T SERVICE BETWEEN KENDALL AND BROADWAY ON THE RED LINE IS REPLACED BY SHUTTLE BUSES APRIL 29.

Grendels has a glorious and very popular half price food menu, (with the purchase of a $3.50 drink) but get your order in early, we'll be settling the tab around 7 PM.

You don't have to be a genuine Intellectual Snob to join. Pseudo-intellectuals are also welcome. All you need is an aloof attitude full of irony and some baffling intellectual ideas or--dare I say it--some unanswerd question you wish to convey incognito.

The premise is to share your intellectual snob idea or question on a name tag (provided) and attach such tag to your shirt, OR chuck such idea or question in a basket in our midst which will be provided and passed around (please pass it around!).

Once this deed is done, pluck from the basket & discuss, if appropriate. This may lead to much laughter, but others may be astounded & perhaps enlightened.

Intellectual apparel is allowed. Startle the waitstaff with a fake mustache, goatee, periwig, or monocle: ALLOWED. No Meerschaum tabacco pipes please. Absinthe is not served.

Take heed, do not attempt to be late. Service quality diminishes after 5:30. Grab the seats while the waitstaff are waiterly. Be patient, these seats are first come first serve.

Like a genuine snob, try to get your order in when others do. Please bring cash. Separate tabs are not encouraged.
item.name: Intellectual Snob Meetup (Chap XIII)
